mapper.select: SELECT gooc.app_key AS app_key, gooc.code AS code, gooc.create_time AS create_time, gooc.expire_time AS expire_time FROM gooagoo_open.oauth_code gooc where 1=1 AND gooc.code =#{oauthCodeBusiness.code} AND gooc.app_key=#{oauthCodeBusiness.app_key} AND SYSDATE() <= #{oauthCodeBusiness.expireTime}
